channel.description:
Whether you have just found out that your child, family member or friend has been diagnosed with an Autism Spectrum Disorder or have been working towards recovery, everyone needs questions answered and support given. Many who have been on the journey now offer free support to those who need it. Autism Spectrum Disorder is treatable and recovery is possible. Every diagnosis and situation is different and the 'best' next step is different for every family. So let's start by getting you set up as a member, so that you can receive the best support and guidence for your particular situation. Take a deep breath; cry those cries and then let's beat this thing together!
1. Education about Autism Spectrum Disorder. Years ago the founder of AutismOne.org, Edmund Arranga, parent of an autisic son, recieved a plea from a parent and that reply started the family's journey to recovery. Though there is a large amount of information here, don't worry. Remember the journey of a thousand miles starts with a single step, click here to take that step.
2. Become a member of the AutismOne.org social network; click here to set up your profile. Membership is free and easy. It allows you to get direct support, ask questions and participate in all the great information, discussion groups and articles we offer. We have the best information available from leading experts in the field and from parents like you, in the trenches, who have been where you are now, alone and confused. Now together, experts and parents can share stories and information freely and easily.
3. Learn what is available at AutismOne.org. Not familiar with social networks or computers? Don't worry, we will help you make the most out all the great tools, information and suport offered by clicking here. Get started today: The Hopes Of A Mother, The Dreams Of A Father Are Real. Our Children Get Better. Be sure to check out http://www.autismone.org/ This Podcast was created using www.talkshoe.com
